item1.paragraph: The safety to perform your professional apointments knowing that you're family is being taken care of.

item2.paragraph: It's easy, quick, and you talk directly with the service providers.

ourServices.title: Our Services
ourServices.subtitle: Select a service to learn more.

homeServices.title: Services for your home
homeServices.text: We have many solutions for maintenance, decorating and cleaning your home.

familyServices.title: Services for your family
familyServices.text: Various sorts of care for your whole family, including your pets!

servicesForYou.title: Services for you
servicesForYou.text: The most diverse range of personal care to ensure your well being.

whatIsHomeAssistent.title: What is HomeAssist4u?
whatIsHomeAssistent.description: Its the website that allows you to hire professionals near your location, to help you with multiple types of services. It's easy, quick, and very efficient:
whatIsHomeAssistent.item1: Search the service you need through our website.
whatIsHomeAssistent.item2: Negotiate directly with the professional you want to hire.
whatIsHomeAssistent.item3: Receive your service and pay directly to your hired worker.

BeAssistant.title: Become a Home Assistant
BeAssistant.description: You have time available and can provide payed service near your home? Come be a Home Assistant
BeAssistant.item1: You get a new source of income.
BeAssistant.item2: You meet new people that can hire you frequently.
BeAssistant.item3: You don't need any technical skill attested by a diploma or certificate!

findSolution.description: Here you will find the solution to make your life easier!

footer.descriptionSocialMedia: Follow us or contact us through our social media:

premiumUser.title: Premium User
premiumUser.text: Find the professional you need, become a premium user.

keepYourProfile.title: Keep your profile active, renew here
keepYourProfile.text: KEEP YOUR PROFILE ACTIVE, RENEW HERE

accountProfile.whyHA: Reasons to why you would like to be a Home Assistant
accountProfile.optInTerms: I accept the use terms and conditions.
accountProfile.optInPolicy: I accept the Privacy Policy terms.
accountProfile.errorTerms: You must accept the privacy and use terms

login.title: Login
login.text: HERE YOU WILL FIND THE SOLUTION TO MAKE YOUR LIFE EASIER!

tooltips.name: Type in your name in the same way it shows on your id. Other users will only be able to see your first name.
tooltips.data: Type in the format DD-MM-YYYY. This information is restricted - It isn't shown to other users
tooltips.cpf: Inform your personal tax identification number. Restricted Information
tooltips.id: Enter the identification document valid in the country where you want to work. Restricted Information
tooltips.uf: Enter the name of the institution that issued your document. For Citizen's Card, enter Portuguese Republic.
tooltips.street: Type in the Avenue, Square or Trav and the street name of your address - Restricted Information
tooltips.complement: Other information from the address location
tooltips.phone: Inform the best for contact, with country and area code - Restricted Information
tooltips.email: Enter the most used one, we will send alerts to this email with each contact from potential customers
tooltips.password: Use a combination of at least 8 digits, with uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers and special characters (@$!%*?&#)
tooltips.activities: You can select several categories as long as you have the concrete experience on each of the selected ones
tooltips.indicationCode: Necessary to maintain the quality and reliability of the registered professionals. If you do not have the code yet, please contact us by e-mail contato@homeassist4u.com. Your profile will be evaluated before we send you the code for your registration
tooltips.document: Send a JPG or PDF copy of the front and back of the same document you previously entered. If the entire document is in a single file, put it in the location defined as front. Restricted Information
tooltips.profilePic: Send us a good picture of your face. We do not accept logos or other different images
tooltips.father: Type as it appears on your ID document. If the space is blank, type BLANK - Restricted Information
tooltips.mother: Type as it appears on your ID document. If the space is blank, type BLANK - Restricted Information
tooltips.birthState: If you were not born in Portugal, write the equivalent in your country of origin - For example: in Brazil it is Estado and in the United States it is State - Restricted Information
tooltips.xpDesc: Describe your professional experience in detail. Remember how important this information is for the contractors' evaluation
tooltips.xpPeriod: Enter the number of years you have worked in the service you have performed the longest
tooltips.courses: Fill in the courses that give you the most credibility. If the name of the institution is relevant, it is worth entering
tooltips.education: Select from the options basic, high school, college or graduate
tooltips.attach: Information such as contacts and document numbers can be seen by any subscribers to the platform. We advise you not to expose this information so you can decide who can know your data
tooltips.hours: Select one option at a time, and then the available times each day. Save and continue selecting the days and times you usually work. Important information for contractors
tooltips.socialMedia: Professional Pages. You can choose whether or not to allow your profiles to be published
tooltips.pets: Important for services performed at the clients' address
tooltips.smoker: Important for services performed at the clients' address
tooltips.notes: If necessary, fill in important information to make your profile more attractive to contractors
tooltips.errorPassword: Password must have uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers and special characters (@$!%*?&#)
